title: The Magical Elven Love Letters, Volume 2
description: The Magical Elven Love Letters are 110 of the many letters that the Silver Elves have been sending out to otherkin since 1979. It is not necessary to read Volume 1 before reading and enjoying Volume 2. These letters give the reader an experiential understanding of what it is to be an elf and enter the realm of Faerie and Magick.
author: The Silver Elves
